summary: This document is a letter from an individual to UBS Financial Services, Inc., authorizing the removal of Power of Attorney and all authorities related to specific accounts. The letter is dated October 19, 2017, and is marked as confidential.

persons.name: Scott
persons.context: Scott is the recipient of the letter from the sender, but no further details about his role are provided.

persons.name: X C C
persons.context: X C C is the individual who sent the letter to UBS Financial Services, Inc., authorizing the removal of Power of Attorney.

keyFacts: It is addressed to UBS Financial Services, Inc.
The letter authorizes the removal of Power of Attorney for specific accounts.
